meanings.definition: A game in which metal balls are thrown at a small wooden ball.
meanings.sent1: During the picnic, we played petanques in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: The family gathered at the park to enjoy a friendly game of petanques.
meanings.sent3: The petanques tournament at the fair was filled with laughter and cheers.
meanings.sent4: His precision in petanques was like a skilled archer hitting the bullseye.
meanings.sent5: The sound of metal balls clinking together filled the air during the petanques match.
